Reason: The 'commitlog_segment_size_in_mb' configuration is classified as performance-sensitive. This is because the size of individual commitlog file segments directly impacts the allocation and management of buffers used for writing and encrypting data in the commit log. The configuration involves time-expensive operations such as creating buffers, writing data, and calculating disk size, which can lead to notable performance variations at the system level. Additionally, the impact of the segment size on system efficiency and recovery time in case of failures further emphasizes the performance sensitivity of this configuration.
